## `safira-cli argocd:remove`

describe the command here

```
USAGE
  $ safira-cli argocd:remove

OPTIONS
  -a, --verbose  Verbose mode (All). Indicate to a formula that it should show log messages in more detail
  -h, --help     show CLI help
```
